Literature.Title: Key residues in octyl-tridecaptin A1 analogues linked to stable secondary structures in the membrane.
Literature.Author: Cochrane SA, Findlay B, Vederas JC, Ratemi ES

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3.13µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=100µg/ml),Campylobacter jejuni NCTC 11168(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=50µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>100µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>100µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 15313(MIC=>100µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 19434(MIC=>100µg/ml)
